radiographic_examinations.findings: Histopathologic examination showed Spitz nevi (SN) with classic characteristics, some with atypical features and others being categorized as atypical Spitzoid neoplasms.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: None of the 38 SN persisted or recurred after the initial biopsy or re-excision. The follow-up period ranged from 3 to 21 years.
